============================================================================================================================

package tr5;

public class exception1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		try
		{
			int a=10,b=0;
			System.out.println(a/b);
		}
		catch(Exception e)
		{
			System.out.println("in catch block");
		}
	}

}
